articles.content: The mother of an eight-year-old schoolgirl picked out of the crowd to lay flowers for the Queen by Princess Kate has told how her daughter cried tears of happiness at meeting a 'real life Princess'.… [+11952 chars]

articles.author: Hannah McGreevy
articles.title: Amanda Holden 'emotional' as she joins grieving Brits barred from seeing Queen's coffin - Express
articles.description: AMANDA HOLDEN explained that the feeling was 'sombre and emotional' as she reported from Westminster this morning, where crowds have been queuing to visit the Queen's coffin.
articles.content:
Amanda shared an image of herself speaking to the crowds of people that had gathered to queue in Westminster to pay their respects to the late monarch.

articles.title: King Charles had never seen cling film and 'shrieked' the first time he saw it - Daily Record
articles.description: The new King of England ''trembled'' the first time he discovered clingfilm according to author, Tom Bower in his book about Prince Philp.
articles.content: The new King of England had never seen cling film before and 'shrieked' the first time he saw it, author Tom Bower shares in his book. Bower wrote a book about Prince Philip, called 'Rebel Prince' wh… [+2298 chars]
